title: 100% Observability at 10% the Cost Using Grepr's Real-Time ML (sponsored by Grepr)
abstract: Engineering team are stuck between a rock and a hard place when it comes to observability: either collect all the data on how your system is behaving or risk not having that one thing needed during an incident. Grepr acts as a proxy between your observability agents and your observability vendor and uses real-time ML to understand the behavior of every piece of data. Grepr's Intelligent Data Engine automatically reduces noise, while keeping all the original raw data in low-cost storage, automatically handling new usage patterns or spikes. The result: minimal configuration, immediate 90% reduction in costs, with no migrations needed. Learn how Grepr works and see it in action in this session. This presentation is brought to you by Grepr, an AWS Partner.

session.title: 100% Observability at 10% the Cost Using Grepr's Real-Time ML (sponsored by Grepr)

title: 4x faster workload modernization with agentic AI
abstract: Discover how to transform enterprise workloads up to 4x faster through the strategic implementation of agentic AI. This lightning talk demonstrates how to evolve your architectural practice from periodic updates to a dynamic, continuous discipline leveraging the AWS Well-Architected Tool and AWS Transform. Learn to systematically evaluate your infrastructure using the AWS Well-Architected Framework's proven methodologies, develop comprehensive data-driven modernization roadmaps, and expedite transformations through AWS Transform's capabilities.

title: 5-Star Customer Service: Duolingo's Path to Compute Savings
abstract: Amazon was founded over offering customers low prices across our wide selection of services. When Duolingo looked to optimize their cloud investments, they experienced this firsthand through their Technical Account Manager (TAM). In this session, Duolingo leaders and their TAM will share their journey: from the TAM’s approach to identifying cost savings to Duolingo’s experience implementing AWS Graviton processors. You’ll hear how the methodology—from cost analysis and proof of concept, through enterprise-wide implementation—led to significant savings. Together, they’ll demonstrate how the TAM’s focus on customer success exemplifies AWS’s commitment to 5-star service, resulting in business value for Duolingo.

title: 800GB of AI data: Lessons from a failed project
abstract: What happens when an ambitious AI project runs into scale, cost, and data hurdles? This session examines the attempt to process 800GB of gameplay data with AI and the technical roadblocks that prevented completion. Learn about the infrastructure bottlenecks, data preparation issues, and cost overruns that derailed the effort. Discover practical lessons to apply when managing large-scale AI workloads on AWS.

title: A $3.7T Wake-Up Call: How data + AI is transforming CX (sponsored by Twilio)
abstract: The price of a poor customer experience has surged YOY, with $3.7T on the line. In this session, you’ll learn how Twilio's ConversationRelay orchestrates speech-to-text flows while AWS Fargate and Bedrock powers intelligence. This technology lays the foundation for a broader Agent Productivity vision - that leverages intelligent virtual agents, real-time human augmentation powered by Redshift & S3, and seamless voice-to-digital handoffs that maximize both efficiency and customer satisfaction. This presentation is brought to you by Twilio, an AWS Partner.

title: Accelerate AI model fine-tuning and deployment with SageMaker HyperPod
abstract: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod accelerates FM development through purpose-built infrastructure. In this session, learn how to leverage HyperPod recipes for efficient LLM customization and use inference operators to deploy models on EKS clusters. Walk through fine-tuning a Llama 8B model using optimized recipes, eliminating weeks of manual configuration, then deploy from S3 using vLLM container while setting up autoscaling and observability. Experience hands-on implementation of distributed training optimizations and simplified LLM deployment using NVIDIA GPU instances. Join us to discover how you can efficiently train, fine-tune, and deploy models on HyperPod compute resources while maximizing utilization across the entire model lifecycle.

title: Accelerate AI workloads with UltraServers on Amazon SageMaker HyperPod
abstract: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod streamlines compute and workload scheduling and management, allowing you to have access to compute resources faster and optimize spend more intelligently. In this session, we will demonstrate how, in a few quick steps, you can specify your preferred UltraServer instance type, desired amount, duration of your workload, and preferred start date and then watch HyperPod provision the infrastructure and run the workloads automatically. Learn to maximize compute resource utilization with HyperPod, and how HyperPod provides advance resiliency and maximizes performance with topology aware scheduling and comprehensive, multi-layered recovery for UltraServers.

title: Accelerate analytics and AI with an open and secure lakehouse architecture
abstract: Data lakes, data warehouses, or both? Join this session to explore how to build a unified, open, and secure data lakehouse architecture, fully compatible with Apache Iceberg, in Amazon SageMaker. Learn how the lakehouse breaks down data silos and opens your data estate offering flexibility to use your preferred query engines and tools that accelerate time to insights. Learn about recent launches that improve data interoperability and performance, and enable large language models (LLMs) and AI agents to interact with your data. Discover robust security features, including consistent fine-grained access controls, attribute-based access control, and tag-based access control that help democratize data without compromises.

title: Accelerate API Creation with Amazon Q Developer CLI
abstract: In this session, learn how to rapidly design and deploy APIs using Amazon Q Developer CLI, OpenAPI, and Amazon API Gateway. You'll create a complete API from scratch, leveraging AI-assisted code generation and best practices, including the use of MCP Servers. Configure advanced features like caching, rate limiting, and payload validation with simple CLI commands. Discover how Amazon Q Developer CLI streamlines the process from OpenAPI specification to fully functional API, enabling faster development and consistent deployments. Leave with practical skills to revolutionize your API creation workflow. You must bring your laptop to participate.

title: Accelerate app authorization with the latest Cedar tools
abstract: In 2025 Cedar released new open source tooling to help accelerate building authorization capabilities into applications. In this hands-on session you'll work directly with Cedar's latest open source tools, including a Cedar schema generator, Express and Spring Boot framework integrations, and the Cedar Analysis CLI. You'll implement policy-based authorization by building a real application, learning how to generate schemas, integrate Cedar with your preferred application framework, and validate authorization policies. Leave with practical knowledge and best practices for implementing authorization using Cedar in your own applications.

title: Accelerate application performance with Amazon S3 Express One Zone
abstract: Amazon S3 Express One Zone delivers consistent single-digit millisecond data access for your most frequently accessed data and latency-sensitive applications. In this chalk talk, dive deep into best practices for getting started with this storage class and using it to maximize the data processing speed of your most demanding applications. Learn about directory buckets and how you can pair your compute and storage in the same AWS Availability Zone. In addition, explore Express One Zone's unique value for analytics customers and real-world examples on caching, checkpointing, and streaming ingest workloads and performance levels.

title: Accelerate & automate secure data transfers at scale with AWS DataSync
abstract: Accelerate your cloud journey by moving your data to AWS quickly and securely with AWS DataSync. In this session, discover best practices for how to move your data at scale with increased performance. Hear a success story from PathAI, an AWS customer whose platform enables AI-powered digital pathology solutions, and learn how they used DataSync to build scalable AI workflows across a global network of hospitals and labs.

title: Accelerate building Serverless apps with Amazon Q and MCP servers
abstract: Experience the future of application development as we demonstrate how to transform a simple prompt into a fully functional serverless application. Watch live coding that showcases how to combine Amazon Q with AWS serverless services using MCP servers to create dynamic, scalable solutions. This session will demonstrate practical implementation techniques, architectural best practices, and how to accelerate development while maintaining production-ready quality.

title: Accelerate Cloud Modernization & Migration with AWS Countdown Premium
abstract: Join us for this hands-on workshop where you'll learn to streamline your application modernization and migration journey using AWS Countdown Premium. This  interactive session will guide you through real-world scenarios, best practices, and proven methodologies for successful cloud transformations. What You'll Learn:Assessment & Planning: Discover and assess your current infrastructure Migration Strategies: Implement the 7 Rs framework (Rehost, Replatform, Refactor, etc.) with practical examplesAutomation at Scale: Leverage AWS automation capabilities to reduce migration time and riskCost Optimization: Apply cost management strategies throughout your migration journeySecurity & Compliance: Maintain security posture during and after migration

title: Accelerate code delivery: Amazon Q developer and dev containers
abstract: Explore advanced integration patterns between development containers, Amazon Q Developer, and validation tools to accelerate AWS infrastructure development. Through live coding, learn how containers enable consistent AI-assisted coding while automatically implementing security controls and quality gates in your IDE. See practical examples of container-based validation tools and discover how this approach transforms development practices. Leave the session with hands-on experience building secure, high-quality AWS solutions integrating AI and container technologies.

title: Accelerate container migrations with Amazon EKS Auto Mode
abstract: As organizations migrate containerized workloads, they often face operational challenges and disruptions. Amazon EKS Auto Mode simplifies this transition, addressing common hurdles when moving to Amazon EKS. This session demonstrates how Auto Mode streamlines the shift from traditional environments or alternative orchestration solutions. Through practical examples, learn how Amazon EKS Auto Mode automates cluster provisioning, scaling, and management, enabling your team to seamlessly migrate applications rather than be tied down by infrastructure operations. Discover how to leverage these capabilities to accelerate your container migration initiatives, reduce operational overhead, and achieve a smooth transition to Amazon EKS without disrupting existing workloads.

title: Accelerate data discovery with object metadata in Amazon S3
abstract: Learn how Amazon S3 Metadata automatically generates rich metadata for your S3 objects in near real-time. We’ll show how S3 Metadata creates a queryable metadata layer that transforms how you discover and manage your data. Watch as we explore and filter objects based on attributes like object creation time and storage class to streamline data preparation for analytics, real-time inference, building automated storage dashboards, and more. Whether you’re managing large-scale data lakes or optimizing data discovery, you’ll get practical insights into metadata-driven data management.

title: Accelerate data migrations to AWS
abstract: Understanding which data to migrate—and why—is crucial for a successful migration to AWS. In this chalk talk, we’ll explore the process of data discovery and workload analysis to drive accurate, workload-aligned migration planning. Through real-world examples, we’ll examine metadata, usage pattern analysis, data locality, and data classification approaches across DAS, NAS, SAN, and hybrid environments. You'll learn how to align migration strategies with AWS storage services, ensuring the best fit for each workload while laying the foundation for your cloud journey.

title: Accelerate Developer Productivity with Amazon's Generative AI Approach
abstract: Get an inside look at how Amazon harnesses generative AI to transform developer productivity. Learn how the combination of AWS Bedrock and agentic AI frameworks powers intelligent developer tools that streamline workflows and automate routine tasks. See real-world examples of spec-driven development automation and AI agent integration. Walk away understanding how to implement similar AI-powered development tools to boost productivity and accelerate delivery in your organization.

title: Accelerate Drug Discovery R&D at Scale with AWS
abstract: 19 of the top 20 pharma companies run their compute on AWS. Drug discovery research and development (R&D) involves various techniques, such as microscopy imaging, molecular dynamics simulation, and virtual screening. These techniques require the management and processing of petabytes of data and have heterogeneous compute requirements.Researchers are also incorporating generative AI to predict protein structures and drive scientific discovery with incorporation of scientific literature findings. Come learn from the AWS Solutions Architects working daily to solve these compute problems on cloud. Bring your questions - this interactive session will dive deep into real-world solutions through whiteboarding and discussion.

title: Accelerate enterprise development with Amazon Q Developer
abstract: In this workshop, explore the transformative impact of generative AI in development. Get hands-on experience with Amazon Q Developer to learn how it can help you understand, build, and operate AWS applications. Explore the IDE to see how Amazon Q provides software development assistance, including code explanation, generation, modernization, and much more. You must bring your laptop to participate.

title: Accelerate enterprise workloads with enhanced Amazon EBS capabilities
abstract: Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) now offers even greater scalability, performance, and speed for your most demanding workloads. In this session, dive deep into the latest volume enhancements to gp3 volumes and learn how io2 Block Express delivers predictable performance at scale across all AWS Regions. Explore how new capabilities like Volume Clones, Provisioned Rate for Volume Initialization, and Time-based Snapshot Copy help you accelerate instance launches, simplify disaster recovery, and streamline development. Whether you’re scaling databases or building resilient environments, this session shows how Amazon EBS helps you move fast and operate securely at scale.

title: Accelerate financial products from idea to market with AI agents
abstract: Financial institutions face increasing complexity to quickly digitize and personalize products across global markets while maintaining regulatory compliance. In this session, we’ll explore how AWS’s agentic AI services and Amazon Nova foundation models automate the digitization of financial offerings—from investment products to insurance policies. Learn how to leverage Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Nova to generate localized marketing assets, accelerate consumer onboarding, and simplify regulatory documentation. Attendees will leave with proven strategies to bring personalized financial products to market faster at global scale.

title: Accelerate Game Design Reviews with Generative AI and LLM Agents
abstract: Traditional game design reviews involve inconsistent evaluation methods and subjective feedback that slows down development. In this session, learn to build AI agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore that streamline workflows by reducing iteration cycles and allowing analysts to focus on strategic game design. Through live demos and code examples, discover how to combine prompt engineering, RAG, MCP servers, and AgentCore to create intelligent systems that analyze design documents for lore consistency, gameplay alignment, and player engagement. Leave with practical knowledge on implementing production-ready AI agents that transform the review process and accelerate creative development at game studios.

title: Accelerate gen AI and ML workloads with AWS storage
abstract: Data has long been considered a strategic asset by organizations, but generative AI puts a renewed emphasis on the importance of a data strategy. Whether you are building your own model or customizing a foundation model, your data is a key differentiator for generative AI, so you need a data strategy that supports relevant, high-quality data. In this session, learn about the data tools that can fuel your generative AI strategy and the common data patterns required to transform your generative AI application from a generic tool to a program that truly knows your business and your customer.

title: Accelerate GenAI-powered data discovery and sharing with SageMaker Catalog
abstract: Join this chalk talk to see how Amazon SageMaker Catalog uses generative AI to make data discovery faster and more intuitive. Learn how teams enrich their data with business-friendly context leveraging GenAI automation by adding business names, summaries, schema descriptions, and automated glossary associations. See how GenAI tagging simplifies search so users can quickly find and understand the right data. We’ll show how to build self-service workflows that enable collaboration while maintaining governance. You'll learn how to create personalized views tailored to different personas for efficient data access. We'll also demonstrate how to centralize access management to align with organizational security requirements and cover real-world implementation patterns such as setting up metadata hierarchies, configuring search taxonomies, and establishing effective sharing mechanisms.

title: Accelerate global contact center modernization with Amazon Connect
abstract: Looking to migrate your contact center with confidence? Learn proven strategies for executing successful global contact center migrations to Amazon Connect through real-world enterprise examples. This interactive session covers essential techniques for navigating complex legacy systems, managing risk, and accelerating implementation while maintaining service quality across multiple regions. You'll gain practical knowledge and proven approaches to confidently lead large-scale Amazon Connect deployments while meeting rigorous timelines.

title: Accelerate Innovation: AI-Driven Automation for Modern Operations (sponsored by PagerDuty)
abstract: See how AI-powered automation is revolutionizing digital operations. AI agents now work across the entire lifecycle, reducing toil by adjusting schedules, diagnosing issues, scribing incidents, executing remediation, and standardizing responses, freeing teams for higher-value work. Discover how organizations apply agentic AI to three types of operational work: well-understood, partially understood, and novel or major events. Learn how to evaluate which tasks are best for agents, where GenAI adds value, and what still demands human expertise so your teams can innovate faster, operate smarter, and continuously improve. This presentation is brought to you by PagerDuty, an AWS Partner.

session.title: Accelerate Innovation: AI-Driven Automation for Modern Operations (sponsored by PagerDuty)

title: Accelerate Legacy Modernization with Slalom & AWS (sponsored by Slalom)
abstract: Start engineering the future. During this lightning talk, learn how Slalom combines AWS-native AI tooling like Amazon Q and Amazon Transform, modern delivery, and human-centered change to turn legacy from a liability into a launchpad. Hear real-life examples and learnings from industries ranging from financial services to retail and consumer goods. Whether you're dealing with aging applications, growing mainframe risk, or fragmented data platforms, modernizing with Slalom and AWS can bring clarity, security, and speed—empowering you to accelerate value delivery, boost business agility, and unlock new revenue-driving capabilities.  This presentation is brought to you by Slalom, an AWS Partner.

session.title: Accelerate Legacy Modernization with Slalom & AWS (sponsored by Slalom)

title: Accelerate mission outcomes with recent AWS government regions innovations
abstract: AWS will share new innovations and an overview of AWS Government Regions (AWS GovCloud (US), AWS Secret and AWS Top-Secret Regions) that propel innovation, accelerate mission outcomes, and enable the U.S. priorities for AI-based global leadership in the regulated U.S. sovereign cloud marketplace. The AWS Government Regions are purpose-built compliant, secure, and scalable cloud infrastructure designed to address mission needs and critical workload requirements for civilian, healthcare, financial services, the U.S. Intelligence Community, the Department of Defense, the supporting industrial base, technology partners, and supporting organizations.

title: Accelerate multi-step SLDC with Amazon Q Developer
abstract: While existing AI assistants focus on code generation with close human guidance, Amazon Q Developer's latest agentic coding experience transforms how developers build software. By using natural language understanding, Q Developer can intelligently perform multi-step tasks that go beyond code generation with minimal human intervention by automatically reading project files to build context, generating code diffs, and running shell commands. Join this session to discover how the new agentic coding experience helps developers go from planning to getting new features in front of customers even faster.

title: Accelerate .NET application modernization with generative AI
abstract: Dreading the complexity and costs of migrating legacy .NET applications? Learn how you can automate and offload tedious manual tasks and port .NET Framework applications to cross-platform .NET using generative AI. Break free of the security issues, rising license costs, and challenges with scaling -- all while freeing your teams to focus on high-impact features that deliver business value.

title: Accelerate new customer engagement and revenue growth
abstract: Join this session to dive deep into new customer engagement, growth, and retention strategies that can scale from small businesses to large enterprises. Learn about AWS Partner best practices, programs, resources, and incentives to help you acquire new customer relationships and grow presence as their strategic advisor. We will provide insights on customer trends, go-to-market activities, point-of-entry solutions, new AWS partner program launches, and co-sell with AWS strategy. AWS takes a “Partner First” mentality in new customer engagement because we believe that together, partners and AWS can help customers innovate and accelerate their business growth.

title: Accelerate platform engineering on Amazon EKS
abstract: Join us for an immersive Platform Engineering workshop that demonstrates how to build and optimize Internal Developer Platforms (IDP) on Amazon EKS. This hands-on session explores cutting-edge tools including Backstage and ArgoCD, while leveraging the power of Generative AI with Amazon Q. Participants will learn to deploy polyglot applications and implement progressive delivery strategies. The workshop also covers AI/ML delivery integration within platform engineering practices. Designed for developers and platform engineers seeking practical experience in building efficient, modern developer platforms on AWS.

title: Accelerate product development lifecycle with a product digital twin
abstract: In this session, discover how cloud computing can shorten the development lifecycle for new products. We will demonstrate this by building a product lifecycle digital thread and using real-world connected product data to iterate on design. Through reference architectures and a live demonstration, we will show how to accelerate embedded software development and hardware design using real-world usage data, digital twins, and simulation, leading to reduced time-to-market, improved product quality, and enhanced cross-functional collaboration.

title: Accelerate SDV Development: Amazon Q for Automotive Code Refactoring
abstract: Discover how General Motors partnered to work with AWS to transform millions of lines of legacy ECU code while accelerating software-defined vehicle development. This chalk talk reveals production-proven prompt engineering patterns that enable Amazon Q Developer tools to reduce technical debt and cyclometric complexity by 30% while maintaining ASIL compliance. Through a live demo, we'll showcase how to overcome context window limitations, ensure functional equivalence, and build team-specific prompt libraries for distributed development. Learn practical techniques for implementing AI-assisted refactoring that shortens new engineer onboarding from months to weeks while supporting your organization's unique coding standards.

title: Accelerate software delivery with Amazon
abstract: In today’s fast-paced landscape, development teams need to deploy code changes to production safely and frequently to deliver business value faster. Learn how Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) capabilities make deployments safer and more reliable for different applications, including blue/green deployments with zero-downtime rollouts, traffic shifting, validation hooks, and automated rollback to help you respond quickly to changing requirements and dependencies.

title: Accelerate supply chain transformation with agentic AI
abstract: Learn how agentic AI can help you improve supply chain planning and execution, from ingesting the full range of data from disparate sources you need to assemble a comprehensive view, to finding the patterns and insights in that data that can alert you to problems before they happen. Improve customer experience by reducing stockouts. Increase financial performance by minimizing excess inventory. Make better predictions when introducing new products or phasing out old ones. Find out how AI agents can automate manual drudgery and free you up for more strategic, value-added work.

title: Accelerate Terraform Provider development worklows with Amazon Q Developer CLI
abstract: AWS's biggest customers rely on Terraform as their front door to the cloud. In this session, HashiCorp reveals how Amazon Q Developer CLI has dramatically accelerated their Terraform Provider development workflow. Learn the practical tips and best practices their team discovered while implementing Amazon Q Developer CLI. Discover how this collaboration is helping deliver cutting-edge AWS capabilities to Terraform users faster than ever before.

title: Accelerate trusted AI development with AWS responsible AI practices
abstract: Organizations face increasing pressure to scale generative AI development without sacrificing safety, accuracy, or speed. This session explores how to leverage the AWS Responsible AI Best Practice Framework to accelerate trusted AI application development. Learn practical strategies for implementing responsible AI practices at the beginning of development rather than after-the-fact, avoiding unnecessary delays and rework. Through real-world examples and hands-on demonstrations, learn science-based, practical strategies for risk assessments, metrics selection, evaluations, and safeguards. Walk away with actionable guidance on building AI applications that align with responsible AI dimensions such as safety, fairness, veracity, and robustness.

title: Accelerate VMware Migration with AWS Transform [AWS Partners only]
abstract: This bootcamp is for AWS Partners only. Learn to expedite VMware migrations using AWS Transform and generative AI capabilities. Get hands-on experience configuring Transform workspaces, assessing workloads, and executing transformation plans. Practice creating migration waves and validating migrated resources. Prerequisites include familiarity with VPC, IAM, MGN, ADS, and VMware environments. You must bring your laptop to participate.

title: Accelerate Your Cloud Adoption with the AWS Management Console
abstract:
Unlock the full potential of the AWS cloud by leveraging the powerful tools in the AWS Management Console. Learn how to streamline your cloud journey using features like Console-to-Code, Instance Finder, and the new tailored in console guidance.
Generate infrastructure as code from console prototypes, integrate console workflows with your existing automation, and quickly design, test, and deploy cloud resources at scale. Hear real world examples of customers maximizing their use of the AWS console to drive cloud adoption.

title: Accelerate Your Cloud Journey with AWS Transform and AWS Skill Builder
abstract: Embark on a faster, smoother cloud transformation with agentic AI and integrated solutions. This session reveals how AWS Transform and AWS Skill Builder work together to accelerate your cloud journey, addressing migration and modernization challenges. Through live demonstrations and real-world examples, discover how to leverage this powerful integration to fast-track your cloud adoption and transformation efforts.

title: Accelerate your hybrid network with AWS Direct Connect SiteLink
abstract: Join this hands-on workshop to explore AWS Direct Connect SiteLink - a feature that enables private connectivity between data center networks via the AWS high-performance global network. Learn key benefits, configuration steps, and how to influence traffic flows using Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) attributes. Discover how to preserve DSCP markings for Quality of Service and support custom BGP community tags, empowering you to optimize performance and policy control across your hybrid network. Attendees will leave with hands-on experience and understand how to leverage the AWS backbone to facilitate inter-DC connectivity using SiteLink.

title: Accelerate your migration & modernization journey with EBA Cloud Party
abstract: Migration and modernization often face challenges - including legacy processes, compressed timelines, scalability, silos (data and people), and technical friction points. Overcome these challenges and accelerate your cloud journey with a truly immersive, hands-on, outcome-focused gamified Experience-Based Acceleration (EBA) cloud party. Become an expert on the latest migration and modernization architectures, build end-to-end solutions with GenAI, and gain hands-on expertise on AWS Transform in a cross-functional manner. Become an innovator of scalable patterns and embrace a new cloud-fluent way of working, while having fun! Are you ready for the most anticipated Cloud Party of 2025?

title: Accelerating AI: How Sun Life reduces latency and enhances engagement
abstract: Organizations are aiming to deliver responsive generative AI experiences that can seamlessly scale across enterprise use cases. Learn how Sun Life transformed content creation and workflow orchestration by building Content Assist—a content, scoring, and rewriting solution that can be trained on any brand guidelines, tone, or examples. Sun Life will share their journey from an AWS Lambda and Amazon Bedrock solution to an AWS AppSync powered streaming UI solution with Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration to support use cases, from corporate-wide productivity tools to automated content creation and contact center authentication. Explore implementation patterns for reducing perceived latency and orchestrating multi-agent workflows.

title: Accelerating AI innovation with NVIDIA GPUs on AWS
abstract: Discover AWS's cutting-edge NVIDIA GPU-powered instances, including the P6 family of instances powered by NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs. Explore how these computing solutions enable training and deployment of trillion-parameter models, support extra-large context windows, and deliver real-time performance for high-concurrency applications. Learn about AWS's innovations in instance security, reliability at scale, and infrastructure efficiency. Hear directly from customers about their experience running GPU-intensive workloads on AWS. Join us to understand how AWS's accelerated computing solutions can drive your AI initiatives forward.

title: Accelerating Business Value with Cloud and AI (sponsored by Infosys)
abstract: Unlock the full potential of your Enterprise AI initiatives. Listen to enterprises as they reveal how the right cloud strategy is integral to accelerating AI innovation and value realization, driving more impactful business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Infosys, an AWS Partner.

title: Accelerating Cloud Migration with Agentic AI: Hands-on AWS Transform
abstract: Join us to discover how AWS Partners can leverage AI-powered AWS Transform to optimize their clients' cloud migration journeys. In this hands-on session, learn how to utilize advanced AI agents to accelerate migration assessments, planning, and workload movements to AWS. Partners will gain valuable insights into prompt engineering strategies, explore practical use cases, and witness a complete automated migration in under an hour. Understand how AWS Transform for VMware and AWS Transform Assessments can help you deliver streamlined migration services while maintaining control and visibility. Bring your questions for an interactive discussion on maximizing your migration practice with AI.

title: Accelerating Development and DevSecOps with Amazon Bedrock & Amazon Q
abstract: Discover how AWS partners are leveraging Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Q to revolutionize both software architecture design and DevSecOps practices. Through real-world examples, explore powerful patterns that enhance the entire development lifecycle. Learn how to use GenAI to accelerate cloud architecture design processes—generating standardized patterns, optimizing configurations, ensuring compliance, and creating documentation. Explore how to integrate AI capabilities with security scanning tools, automated code generation, CI/CD pipelines, and threat modeling frameworks. This session showcases how AWS partners have implemented these solutions to improve consistency, maintain compliance, and automate security tasks. Bring your questions to this collaborative session.

title: Accelerating Engineering: Cross-Industry HPC Cloud Transformations
abstract: This breakout session highlights how AWS HPC is transforming engineering and product development across industries. From accelerating prototyping cycles to scaling semiconductor design, organizations are overcoming traditional on-premises limitations with the cloud. You’ll hear how global R&D teams are leveraging AWS HPC instances, Elastic Fabric Adapter, FSx for Lustre, and ParallelCluster to achieve faster design iterations, reduced time-to-market, and more efficient innovation at scale. Join us to see how AWS empowers engineers and researchers to push boundaries in simulation, design, and development across automotive, semiconductor, and consumer product domains.

session.title: Accelerating Engineering: Cross-Industry HPC Cloud Transformations
Unpredictable by Design: Finding Innovation with Generative AI (sponsored by Deloitte)

title: Accelerating Incident Resolution: AI-Driven Root Cause Analysis
abstract: When critical incidents occur, every minute counts. This session showcases how AI can dramatically speed up your incident response and root cause analysis process. Work through real-world scenarios using Amazon CloudWatch investigations to experience AI-driven insights in action. Practice initiating guided investigations through natural language queries and alarm triggers. Gain hands-on experience using generative AI to rapidly analyze system telemetry, correlating data from metrics, logs, and deployment events. Learn to evaluate AI-generated suggestions to pinpoint root causes more efficiently, significantly reducing mean time to resolution (MTTR).

title: Accelerating incident response through AIOps
abstract: Discover how cutting-edge AI technologies are revolutionizing incident management and dramatically reducing Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR). This session explores how generative AI is transforming operational practices by automatically analyzing telemetry data, identifying patterns, surfacing actionable insights and leveraging AI agents. Learn how modern AI capabilities can convert hours of manual troubleshooting across multiple systems into streamlined investigations resolved in minutes.

title: Accelerating Life Sciences Regulatory Intelligence with Amazon Bedrock Agents
abstract: Discover how AI agents are revolutionizing pharmaceutical compliance through an innovative Regulatory Intelligence Framework. Using Amazon Bedrock Agents and Nova Pro LLM, learn how to automate complex regulatory monitoring across global agencies with unprecedented accuracy and efficiency. This session provides practical insights into implementing a secure, scalable solution that transforms regulatory compliance for pharmaceutical and healthcare organizations. See firsthand how cutting-edge AI technology can streamline your compliance processes while maintaining the highest security standards.

title: Accelerating .NET and SQL Server modernization using agentic AI
abstract: Accelerate the deployment and operation of your .NET applications and SQL Server workloads with agentic AI-powered experience on AWS. This session shows how to simplify and automate the path from source code to production, handling infrastructure provisioning, database configuration, and deployment pipelines while ensuring adherence to AWS best practices. Through hands-on examples, learn how to streamline complex workflows into intuitive, guided steps, reduce manual effort, and improve reliability. See how AWS agentic AI helps you build, deploy, and operate production-ready .NET applications with SQL Server backends efficiently — unlocking better scalability, resilience, and developer productivity.

title: Accelerating Real-World Evidence Generation in Life Sciences
abstract: Life sciences organizations are transforming healthcare data analysis using Amazon Web Services (AWS). By converting real-world data (RWD) into real-world evidence (RWE) through AWS Clean Rooms and the Real-World Data Insights Generating Agent, companies can make faster, more informed decisions. Learn how partnerships with companies like Datavant are enabling companies to streamline their data acquisition, analysis, and collaboration processes. This advancement accelerates evidence generation and supports more efficient clinical development decision-making.

title: Accelerating Research at Scale: MIT’s Self-Service Portal
abstract: Discover how MIT and AWS co-developed a lightweight, cloud-native portal that transforms the way researchers access compute environments—cutting “time to research” from weeks to minutes. This session dives into the architecture behind the AWS Research Accelerator, a scalable self-service interface that enables researchers to launch AWS and hybrid workloads independently, while giving administrators full visibility into usage and cost. Built to meet the dual demands of researcher agility and institutional governance, the solution supports onboarding at scale, integrates with on-prem resources, and empowers admins with predictive analytics and chargeback tools. Learn how you can replicate this model to accelerate innovation in your own organization.

title: Accelerating SaaS Implementations with Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Nova
abstract: SaaS providers often struggle with multi-month customer implementations because of manual configuration processes —incurring high costs and delayed time-to-value. Discover how a leading HCM provider’s cloud-native Agentic AI Platform on AWS—powered by Amazon Nova Pro and Amazon Bedrock models— reduced customer onboarding from 12 months to mere days by automating workflows implementation (Exploratory Data Analysis, Mapping, Transformation, and more). We’ll share the architectural blueprint and actionable patterns that SaaS providers can adopt to build agent-driven deployments, boost customer success team productivity, accelerate revenue, and uphold rigorous data-security standards.

title: Accelerating SAP Transformation with Amazon EC2 with the latest Intel Xeon CPUs (sponsored by Intel)
abstract: This session explores how EC2 instance families like the High Memory U7inh series (with up to 32 TB RAM) and memory-optimized R8i instances deliver exceptional scale-up capabilities and price-performance for SAP HANA, SAP application servers, and RISE with SAP deployments. Learn how certified EC2 instances enable fast, secure deployment of SAP workloads in the cloud, supporting business continuity and operational resilience—backed by real-world success stories and insights from industry experts. Hear from a leading global automotive manufacturer who rapidly deployed a business-critical SAP landscape using AWS EC2 U7i instances, powered by Intel Xeon processors, to meet demanding performance and reliability requirements. This presentation is brought to you by Intel, an AWS Partner.

session.title: Accelerating SAP Transformation with Amazon EC2 with the latest Intel Xeon CPUs (sponsored by Intel)
Accelerating SAP Transformation with Amazon EC2 with the latest Intel Xeon CPUs (sponsored by Intel)

title: Accelerating semiconductor design, simulation, and verification on AWS
abstract: This session covers the latest compute and storage innovations such as the new generation of Amazon EC2 instances powered by custom Intel Xeon Scalable processors (Granite Rapids), AMD EPYC processors (Turin), and AWS Graviton, and new features of FSx for NetApp ONTAP.

title: Accelerating Smart Product SDLC with Amazon Q Developer
abstract: Smart product developers and product managers face demands for rapid development cycles, quick response to customer needs, and continuous product improvement, all while managing the complexity of integrating hardware and software. This session showcases the capabilities of Amazon Q Developer, demonstrating an HMI system and fleet management dashboard with over 99% AI-generated code. This example illustrates how AI can enhance every aspect of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC), from initial research and planning to deployment. This session explores how Amazon Q Developer brings breakthrough solutions across all SDLC phases, resulting in reduced development time, improved code quality, and accelerated innovation.

title: Accelerating SQL Server modernization on AWS with agentic AI
abstract: This chalk talk explores how organizations can modernize their SQL Server environments on AWS by combining advanced migration strategies with the latest generative AI capabilities. Learn how AWS uses generative AI to automate and optimize complex schema conversions—rewriting stored procedures and business logic for cloud-native targets with minimal manual intervention. Discover how to leverage SQL Server 2025’s built-in AI features, including vector search and semantic search, to enable intelligent, real-time applications post-migration. Engage in interactive discussions and white boarding on designing end-to-end architectures that unlock operational agility, cost savings, and next-generation AI-driven insights.

title: Accelerating sustainability compliance with AI-powered document review
abstract: Sustainability regulations require extensive documentation reviews, creating bottlenecks in compliance workflows. RAPID (Review & Assessment Powered by Intelligent Documentation) transforms this process using AI with a human-in-the-loop approach. This solution dramatically accelerates certification and regulatory compliance document reviews - processes traditionally requiring significant expert review hours. RAPID structures complex regulatory checklists, applies AI to identify compliance issues, and maintains human oversight for critical decisions. The solution's serverless architecture enables organizations to start small and scale efficiently, reducing review time while improving assessment quality. Learn how RAPID helps organizations overcome administrative barriers and focus resources on implementing sustainable practices rather than paperwork.

title: Accelerating the shift from batch to real-time streaming
abstract: In today's fast-paced environment, timely insights from data are crucial for organizations to maintain a competitive edge and respond effectively to market and customer demands. This chalk talk explores the transformative shift from traditional batch processing to stream processing, enabling real-time data- driven decision-making. Attendees will gain insights into key streaming concepts, architectural patterns, challenges, and best practices for a seamless migration journey. Through a compelling use case demonstrating the benefits of transitioning to real-time data processing with AWS streaming services, participants will acquire a roadmap for embracing stream processing, unlocking agility, responsiveness, and competitive advantage.

services: Amazon Managed Streaming for Apache Kafka (Amazon MSK)

title: Accelerating Vehicle Innovation: ML & HPC Best Practices
abstract: Discover how Toyota is transforming product development by migrating HPC and ML workloads to AWS. Partner Deloitte will showcase the customer success story and demonstrate how EC2 GPU-powered and HPC instances accelerate development cycles from months to weeks while improving performance. This session dives into architectures that enable robotics research, complex simulations, and predictive analytics for safer, more efficient engineering. Whether modernizing legacy environments or building new HPC workflows, you’ll gain practical insights into designing high-performance solutions with AWS’s latest compute innovations and best practices.

title: Accelerating workload modernization using next generation agentic AI
abstract: This session will focus on how AWS is leveraging generative AI tools to accelerate the migration and modernization of workloads either to AWS or running on AWS. This session will explore the latest agentic AI tools from for VMware, .Net, Mainframe, Java, and SQL Server. Additionally, we will cover how these tools are enabling AWS Partners to integrate with AWS tools, and third party ISV tools.

title: Achieve multicloud FinOps visibility
abstract: Organizations with multicloud environments need to implement FinOps practices that help manage costs across cloud providers. In this session, discover how to implement unified multicloud cost reporting using the FinOps Open Cost and Usage Specification (FOCUS) Dashboard and Amazon QuickSight. Learn practical approaches for consolidating diverse billing data formats, creating automated data collection pipelines, and securing sensitive financial information. We'll demonstrate how to use visualization and AI to identify actionable insights from billing data. Walk away with strategies for data export configuration, automation, and dashboard customization techniques that help drive informed financial decisions for teams across multicloud environments.

title: A complete guide to Amazon EVS: Unlock AWS scale for VMware workloads
abstract: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) is your fastest path to run VMware workloads on AWS, eliminating the need to replatform or refactor. Discover how Amazon EVS helps you unlock AWS scale and agility while maximizing existing VMware investments and skillsets. Explore core building blocks and guidance on self-managing or leveraging AWS Partners for your environments. We'll cover strategies for customizing your virtualization stack in the cloud, including integration with storage, backup, and disaster recovery solutions. Through a live demo, we'll showcase intuitive deployment workflows and share the latest service innovations to provide you with more choice and flexibility.

title: Actionable controls for improving governance and compliance
abstract: Organizations often struggle to translate complex regulatory requirements into practical controls while maintaining continuous compliance and security assurance. Learn how to transform compliance frameworks into actionable AWS controls through effective gap analysis and control mapping. This session shows how to leverage AWS Control Tower, AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, and AWS Audit Manager to build and maintain a scalable governance strategy. We'll explore real-world examples of mapping common controls across multiple frameworks, implementing automated compliance checks, and creating custom control deployments. Discover how to streamline compliance reporting while maintaining continuous security assurance across your AWS organization.

title: Active defense strategies using AWS Al/ML services
abstract: This workshop will help you learn how to develop and deploy active defense strategies, such as deception, using Amazon Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker. Gain hands-on experience developing AI-driven responses for security operations. You will learn how to develop adaptive responses that mimic what an actor may be trying use against you. Discover implementation patterns for prompt engineering, deployment strategies, and monitoring methodologies. You must bring your laptop to participate.

title: A day in the life of an AWS WAF administrator
abstract: From sunrise alerts to sunset cost reports, the AWS WAF administrator’s day is never dull. Join us as we follow a fictional (but all-too-relatable) admin navigating setup, fine-tuning rules, building dashboards, and taming budgets - while outsmarting emerging threats before they bite. You’ll see how to adapt quickly to shifting traffic, uncover hidden risks, and make data-driven decisions without breaking the bank - or the application. Packed with tips, real-world examples, and a dash of bot traffic, this session turns the daily grind of web application protection into a well-architected adventure (edited)

title: Adding  agentic AI to legacy apps with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
abstract: In this code-first session, we demonstrate how to add agentic AI capabilities and augment a legacy application using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and the Amazon Strands Agents SDK. We will explore how to build AI-powered features for a legacy application without modifying the existing backend code. We will showcase how to leverage existing APIs and Lambda functions as the backbone for your agentic AI experience. You'll learn how to execute code in isolated sandbox environments, ensuring security while accessing internal data sources with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter.

title: Address digital sovereignty with hybrid and cloud solutions
abstract: As organizations scale innovative solutions globally, they need to navigate complex digital sovereignty requirements. This session explores how AWS can help you accelerate global scaling while meeting regulatory obligations. We'll compare various sovereign infrastructure options with a focus on AWS Local Zones, AWS Dedicated Local Zones, AWS Outposts, and AWS European Sovereign Cloud. Learn how to choose the best option for your sovereign needs and architect applications for data residency and resiliency. Discover how to implement security controls to regulate how data can be stored, processed, and transferred, and how to prevent unauthorized data access.

title: A decade of API Gateway: Architecting the future of API Management
abstract: As organizations integrate AI agents with existing systems, they must revisit strategies for API building, management, and governance. This session demonstrates how AWS services and features help implement effective API strategies throughout the complete lifecycle, highlighting key considerations at each stage and tools available to ensure successful implementation. We'll cover practical approaches in API design, development, and management to address the needs of both traditional users and AI agents. You will learn real-world implementation patterns and tools that ensure successful API management and governance in environments where agents interact alongside human developers.

title: A deep dive into AI/ML development in SageMaker Unified Studio
abstract: ML teams often struggle with fragmented tools and disconnected solutions that slow down AI development. SageMaker Unified Studio offers a single environment for data processing, integration, and analysis alongside trusted tools for AI/ML development. This deep dive session will demonstrate how SageMaker Unified Studio streamlines the path from data management to ML model deployment, with a focus on purpose-built tools for each step of the model lifecycle.

title: A deep dive on IAM policy evaluation
abstract: In this chalk talk, learn how policy evaluation works in detail and walk through some advanced AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy evaluation scenarios. Discover how request context is evaluated, explore delegation patterns AWS services use to make requests, understand various condition keys and their optimal use, and receive recommendations for use of each policy type.

title: Adopting AI within Streaming Architectures (sponsored by Redpanda)
abstract: The fusion of AI and real-time data streaming is transforming how organizations process, analyze, and act on information. This talk examines the practical application of AI within streaming architectures, exploring where it makes sense to deploy emerging AI concepts such as Agentic AI and Generative AI. We will discuss techniques for integrating AI models into stream processing pipelines, as well as address challenges including maintaining low latency, establishing effective governance, and ensuring the connectivity required to build a robust AI foundation for streaming workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Redpanda, an AWS Partner.

title: Advanced agentic RAG Systems: Deep dive with Amazon Bedrock
abstract: Dive deep into building a production-grade agentic RAG system using Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases, Strands, and AgentCore in this expert-level code talk. Through live coding, explore how to build an agentic RAG system from scratch and learn best practices for preparing your implementation for production. This hands-on session covers how to set up your agentic RAG system with observability, security, and identity management in mind. Prerequisites: strong experience with Python, agentic, and production RAG implementations.

title: Advanced AI Security: Architecting Defense-in-Depth for AI Workloads
abstract: Dive deep into advanced security architectures for AI workloads, exploring how to protect your workload against sophisticated attack vectors. Through technical demonstrations, we'll implement secure architectures for AI workloads, covering identity, fine-grained access policies, and secure foundation model deployment patterns. Learn how to harden generative and agentic AI applications using AWS security capabilities, implementing least-privilege controls, and building secure architectures at scale.

title: Advanced analytics with AWS Cost and Usage Reports
abstract: Are you looking to take your AWS cost management to the next level? In this live coding session, discover how to leverage AWS Cost and Usage Reports (CUR) alongside Amazon Q to streamline query development and automate code generation for detailed cost allocation. Learn best practices for breaking down costs, access control of your data access and optimization discoveries. Walk away with practical techniques for analyzing usage patterns, optimizing spend, and building secure, scalable cost analytics solutions on AWS.

title: Advanced authorization patterns for secure serverless applications
abstract: Learn how to tackle complex authorization challenges in multi-tenant serverless SaaS applications using modern declarative security controls on AWS. This session demonstrates how to implement efficient tenant isolation and access management using AWS Verified Permissions and Cedar policies across serverless and container architectures. Through PDP/PEP patterns, discover how to externalize security controls from application code, enabling better maintainability and scalability. We'll explore practical implementations of RBAC/ABAC policies for tenant-specific security requirements while adhering to zero-trust principles. Perfect for architects and developers building robust, scalable security controls in their SaaS applications.

title: Advanced AWS Network Security : Building Scalable Production Defenses
abstract: In this hands-on workshop, master AWS network security techniques to defend against today's most critical threats. Learn to implement layer 7 capabilities and deep packet inspection using AWS Network Firewall and Route 53 Resolver DNS Firewall, securing both internet-bound and internal traffic flows. Gain practical experience in configuring scalable, reliable filtering to combat zero-day attacks and ransomware, while also implementing sophisticated east-west traffic controls to prevent lateral movement. Through real-world scenarios, you'll learn to leverage IDS/IPS filtering, domain-based controls, and principle of least privilege using fully managed AWS services. Leave equipped to build resilient network defenses against modern cyber threats.

title: Advanced data modeling for Amazon ElastiCache
abstract: This session delves into the intricacies of Amazon ElastiCache data modeling using the purpose-built Valkey data types to optimize application performance and scalability. Explore the use of strings, sets, sorted sets, hashes, bitmaps, and geospatial indexes to model complex relationships and solve use cases such as caching, session store, feature store, real-time analytics, geospatial applications, and rate limiters.

title: Advanced data modeling with Amazon DynamoDB
abstract: Amazon DynamoDB is a popular choice for modern applications because it’s a serverless database that provides single-digit millisecond performance at any scale. Optimizing your usage of DynamoDB requires a different approach to data modeling than traditional relational databases. In this session, AWS Data Hero Alex DeBrie shows you advanced techniques to help you get the most out of DynamoDB. Learn how to “think in DynamoDB” by learning the DynamoDB foundations and principles for data modeling. Further, learn practical strategies and DynamoDB features to handle difficult use cases in your application.

title: Advanced data resiliency: Recovery strategies for AWS storage
abstract: In this workshop, you'll implement advanced recovery and data protection strategies for Amazon S3, Amazon EFS, and Amazon EBS with AWS Backup. Using a financial services application architecture, build data resilience solutions and execute step-by-step recovery procedures against simulated cyber threats. Configure advanced protection mechanisms for ransomware and insider threats, then test recovery scenarios at scale. Through hands-on exercises, orchestrate complex recovery operations across multiple services, validate restored data integrity, and deploy AWS-native security features to strengthen your storage recovery capabilities.

title: Advanced DDoS protection and DNS capabilities in AWS GovCloud (US)
abstract: In this session, you will learn DDoS protection mechanisms through AWS Shield to safeguard your AWS infrastructure. Explore anti-DDoS capabilities with AWS WAF for faster automatic detection and mitigation for DDoS events. Discover key considerations, best practices, and reference architectures that include Amazon Route 53 and Application Load Balancer and help you achieve defense-in-depth objectives. Join this session to learn how to manage Amazon Route 53 authoritative DNS service for public hosted zones directly in AWS GovCloud (US) and explore migration strategies including DNSSEC considerations and health check implementations. Learn about pro tips for building a layered infrastructure security approach.

title: Advanced document processing with increased accuracy and compliance
abstract: Discover how to build sophisticated document processing workflows using Amazon Nova and AWS Bedrock in this interactive chalk talk. We'll explore real-world applications across insurance claims, healthcare records, and financial document analysis—industries where manual corrections and processing delays increase costs. AWS experts will demonstrate advanced fine-tuning techniques, domain-specific customization strategies, evaluation frameworks, and production deployment patterns. Learn how to achieve 95%+ accuracy in document processing tasks by combining Nova's multimodal capabilities with Bedrock's integration and agentic workflows. Attendees will gain practical implementation approaches for scaling intelligent document processing while optimizing for cost, latency, accuracy, and compliance at scale.

title: Advanced model customization with Amazon Nova
abstract: Master advanced fine-tuning techniques to customize Amazon Nova in this engaging 60-minute hands-on session. Learn to adapt Amazon Nova for financial advisory and investment analysis, including analyzing market data, assessing investment opportunities, and generating personalized financial recommendations. Implement effective fine-tuning strategies and optimize model performance for your domain-specific applications. Leave with practical experience building next-generation models that deliver advanced reasoning for your specific use cases.

title: Advanced multicloud cost reporting with FOCUS
abstract: In this interactive code talk, we'll dive into adopting the FinOps Open Cost and Usage Specification (FOCUS) for unified cloud cost reporting. Participants will learn how to overcome cross-cloud reporting challenges, implement the FOCUS data model, query FOCUS data and visualize the data across multiple providers using FOCUS's standardized schema. Leave with working code samples and practical strategies to implement FOCUS in your organization, enabling true financial transparency across your multicloud environment.

title: Advanced Network Connectivity Patterns for ISVs
abstract: Building secure and scalable networks for SaaS requires careful consideration of tenant isolation, compliance, and operational efficiency. Join this session to learn how leading ISVs are leveraging services like Amazon VPC, AWS PrivateLink, AWS Transit Gateway, and Amazon VPC Lattice  build reliable multi-tenant architectures. Walk away with blueprints and best practices to help you build resilient multi-tenant networking architectures.

title: Advanced RAG Architectures: From Basic Retrieval to Agentic RAG
abstract: Join us for this hands-on Code Talk where we'll dive deep into building advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures that effectively handle large-scale documents. Through live coding demonstrations, we'll explore techniques to enhance retrieval accuracy and context preservation when dealing with complex documents. Watch and code along as we implement multi-step RAG, recursive retrieval, and agent-driven approaches that intelligently chunk and process large texts, decompose queries, evaluate responses, and orchestrate complex tasks. You'll see real AWS customer code examples and learn practical strategies for building more accurate, scalable Generative AI applications. Bring your laptop and questions for this interactive session with AWS experts.

title: Advanced S3 performance engineering: From multipart to resilience
abstract: Master advanced Amazon S3 performance optimization techniques across storage classes, including S3 Standard for general purpose storage and S3 Express One Zone for the highest performance needs. This expert-level workshop focuses on implementing sophisticated data transfer patterns using multipart uploads and Transfer Manager. Design and deploy resilient applications with advanced retry strategies and robust error handling mechanisms. Through technical exercises, build high-performance solutions for large-scale data transfers across different S3 storage classes. Learn to optimize your applications for specific performance requirements, from cost-effective general storage to ultra-low latency implementations.

title: Advanced security patterns on Amazon S3
abstract: Amazon S3 security settings and access controls are suitable for virtually any workload. In this chalk talk, equip yourself with proven patterns for managing access at scale. Learn how to optimize policy usage, scale beyond AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy limits, and secure your data lake perimeter.

title: Advanced Stream Processing with Apache Flink
abstract: Unlock the power of Apache Flink for real-time, stateful stream processing on AWS using Amazon Managed Service for Apache Flink. This chalk talk covers advanced patterns for event processing, state management, and fault tolerance, showing how Flink powers intelligent, scalable, and resilient architectures for applications like trading, anomaly detection, and personalization. Dive deep into integrating Flink with Amazon MSK, Amazon Kinesis Data Streams, and other AWS services, and get your toughest questions answered.

title: Advanced VPC design and new capabilities
abstract: Amazon VPC is a foundational service on AWS, giving you control over your virtual networking environment. Every year, AWS makes updates to Amazon VPC to help improve functionality, security, and usability. In this session, learn about the latest updates to Amazon VPC and how you can use them to enhance your current architectures.

title: Advancing Behavioral Health Analytics with Integrated Cloud Services (sponsored by Deloitte)
abstract: To facilitate and assist Virginians obtain effective and timely behavioral health support before, during, and after a crisis, DBHDS is using the cloud to overcome decades of operational challenges to exchange, secure, and aggregate data from the Commonwealth of Virginia’s network of behavioral and mental health providers. Learn how DBHDS is leveraging AWS and Snowflake to build a modern Enterprise Data Warehouse using a serverless, event-driven architecture to streamline data management, improve data quality, match individuals across multiple health systems, and improve outcomes reporting on critical programs serving vulnerable populations. This presentation is brought to you by Deloitte, an AWS Partner.

session.title: Advancing Behavioral Health Analytics with Integrated Cloud Services (sponsored by Deloitte)
Designing with Agents: A Playbook for Enterprise Engineering Leaders (sponsored by Windsurf)

speakers.companyName: Department of Behavioral Health and Developmental Services
speakers.globalCompany: Department of Behavioral Health and Developmental Services

session.title: Advancing Behavioral Health Analytics with Integrated Cloud Services (sponsored by Deloitte)

title: Agent based Network Ops : Amazon Bedrock Agents & Agent Core
abstract: Discover the power of Agent-driven Network Operations with Amazon Bedrock Agents and AgentCore in this hands-on workshop. Build intelligent agents capable of automating common network operational tasks while gaining insights into the seamless integration of Agents, Knowledge bases, and Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers with AWS tools such as VPC Reachability Analyzer, Transit Gateway flow logs, and CloudWatch features. Through engaging, real-world exercises, learn firsthand how agents can transform traditional NetOps procedures. You will walk away with an understanding of how agent-based NetOps can reduce resolution times and enhance operational reliability in common network operational tasks.

title: Agent down! Building unbreakable AI workflows
abstract: Explore how chaos engineering (resilience testing) principles apply to autonomous AI agent workflows in this chalk talk. Learn to stress-test agent-based systems that handle complex, multi-step tasks using AWS Fault Injection Service. Discover how to identify and mitigate failure modes unique to agentic AI, including decision-making loops, task handoff failures, and resource coordination breakdowns. Practice designing experiments that validate agent resilience across orchestration layers, memory systems, and tool interactions. Perfect for teams building or maintaining autonomous AI workflows, this chalk talk provides practical techniques for improving resilience in agent-driven architectures.

title: Agentic AI advancements in customer experience with Amazon Connect
abstract: Amazon Connect transforms routine interactions into memorable moments by seamlessly embedding AI across every customer touchpoint - built from the ground up as a unified solution that's been cloud and AI-native since day one. By driving seamless coordination between human and AI agents, it preserves context across every interaction to drive differentiated customer experiences. Join this session with Pasquale DeMaio, VP of Customer Experience, on how Amazon Connect is revolutionizing contact centers through agentic AI. Hear from your peers as they share their firsthand experience and best practices, illustrating the real-world impact and benefits of AI-powered customer service.

title: Agentic AI beyond the cloud: Building autonomy at the edge
abstract: As humanity pushes the limits of remote deployments, terrestrially and extra-terrestrially, unique engineering challenges arise. The far edge can be disconnected, denied, intermittent, and limited; constraining hardware size, weight, power, and network connectivity. IWe'll explore building and deploying autonomous AI agents at the edge using small language models. Through interactive whiteboarding and hardware examples, we dive into hardware considerations, model selection, and optimization strategies for AI in resource constrained environments. Join us and learn how to tackle the unique challenges of deploying autonomous AI agents at the edge; enabling intelligent operations from the depths of remote mines to deep space.

title: Agentic AI for Autonomous Networks: AgentCore Design Patterns in Action
abstract: Join us for a deep dive into design patterns that customers like BT Group are implementing to transform telecom networks into intent-driven autonomous systems. Learn how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, its services, and tools enable customers to achieve scalable session isolation, convert telemetry into agent-ready tools, maintain persistent context graphs, and provide execution transparency—essential prerequisites for production deployments at scale. We'll conclude with a whiteboarding session showcasing reference architectures that guide telecom customers toward autonomous Dark NOC operations, including closed-loop RCA, service impact analysis, predictive anomaly suppression, and closed-loop orchestration.

title: Agentic AI for Intelligent Observability with OpenSearch Service
abstract: Discover how Amazon OpenSearch Service is evolving beyond traditional search and analytics to power next-generation agentic AI-powered observability solutions. We'll showcase how organizations can reduce operational costs by modernizing their observability stack using OpenTelemetry, OpenSearch, and CloudWatch across hybrid environments spanning cloud and on-premises infrastructure. Learn how to implement OpenSearch's Model Context Protocol (MCP) framework and agentic AI capabilities to create intelligent, autonomous analytics workflows. We'll demonstrate building sophisticated observability solutions that combine OpenSearch's real-time analytics with AI-powered insights using Amazon Q. Learn how vector capabilities and native integrations can enable predictive insights and automated root cause analysis to transform OpenSearch into an intelligent, agentic AI-based analytics solution.

title: Agentic AI for member-owned financials: Systems that serve
abstract: Credit unions and insurance organizations can leverage AI agents for automating complex workflows. In this code talk we’ll demonstrate going from concept to production with spec-driven development. We’ll work backwards from your business processes such as lending automation, claims processing, and fraud detection to turn prompts into detailed specifications, code, documents, and tests. Using prompts as code, we'll build production-ready agents using Strands Agents SDK and AWS services. Attendees will leave equipped with implementation tools, sample code, and best practices for building and deploying agentic AI solutions that transform credit union and insurance operations while ensuring explainable, compliant AI decision-making.

title: Agentic AI for Vehicle Diagnostics and Root Cause Analysis
abstract: In this session, attendees will learn to build an advanced multi-agent diagnostic system for automotive troubleshooting using the Generative AI Application Builder on AWS solution. Leveraging Strands Agents SDK and Model Context Protocol (MCP), participants will create collaborative AI agents that analyze vehicle data, perform diagnostics, and generate repair recommendations. The system integrates with repair manuals via Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) , estimates costs, and maintains safety guardrails. By deploying this solution with Amazon Bedrock models, attendees will experience how AI agents can revolutionize complex vehicle diagnostics, enhancing efficiency for service technicians and engineers.

title: Agentic AI for VMware migrations with AWS Transform for VMware
abstract: Accelerate your VMware migration journey with AWS Transform, the first agentic AI service for large-scale VMware workload migrations to Amazon EC2. Discover how to migrate from on-premises VMware infrastructure to a modernized, cloud-native architecture while overcoming challenges like evolving licensing models and vendor lock-in. Meet the team behind AWS Transform and see a live demonstration showcasing automated application discovery, dependency mapping, network translation, wave planning, and server migration with optimized EC2 instance selection. Learn practical approaches to streamline large-scale migrations and modernize VMware workloads to AWS with greater speed and confidence.

title: Agentic AI Foundations on AWS
abstract: This bootcamp course introduces agentic AI development on AWS. Learn the core components of autonomous AI systems including goals, memory, and tools. Explore different types of agents and implementation patterns using Amazon Q and Amazon Bedrock Agents. Gain practical insights through hands-on labs and demonstrations. Perfect for developers and technical professionals transitioning into agentic AI development while understanding AWS Generative AI service capabilities.

title: Agentic AI Meets responsible AI: Strategy and best practices
abstract: AI agents offer powerful capabilities and require thoughtful design to help manage risks. This session explores responsible agentic AI implementation with appropriate controls and governance. Learn design approaches for human in the loop, risk mitigation, evaluation methods, and control mechanisms to help align agent behaviors with organizational goals. Whether building agent hierarchies, workflow agents, or decision engines, gain actionable guidance on making agentic AI both effective and trustworthy on AWS. Discover practical strategies for implementing agents in a model- and framework-agnostic way to define safeguards for real-world deployment.

title: Agentic AIOps: How LogicMonitor & WWT See Enterprises Readying for Autonomous IT (sponsored by LogicMonitor)
abstract: Agentic AI is transforming enterprise IT by enabling systems that act autonomously, adapt in real time, and accelerate smarter decision-making. Yet, this innovation introduces new complexity. In this session, leaders from LogicMonitor and WWT share how IT organizations can evaluate their Agentic AIOps maturity, choose the right AI partners, and implement with the right balance of autonomy and oversight. We’ll examine what sets Agentic AIOps apart, how to assess readiness and drive adoption, and highlight real-world customer case studies to show how enterprises are preparing for the era of autonomous IT agents. This presentation is brought to you by LogicMonitor, an AWS Partner.

session.title: Agentic AIOps: How LogicMonitor & WWT See Enterprises Readying for Autonomous IT (sponsored by LogicMonitor)

title: Agentic AI: Powering the future of social good
abstract: The social good sector is at a pivotal moment, facing growing demands and increasing complexity. In this workshop, discover how agentic AI architecture can revolutionize nonprofit operations and mission delivery. Using the Strands SDK you’ll build a team of specialized agents that will work together to streamline data management, automate workflows, and enable natural language interactions. You’ll leave with a deep understanding of agentic AI and its potential to solve mission-critical challenges. Walk away with the tools to build agentic workloads with the Strands SDK and host them on AgentCore, empowering your teams to focus on high-impact initiatives.

title: Agentic AI's new generation of Industry and Line of Business solutions
abstract: This session will focus on the latest Industry & LOB solutions, from Generative AI solutions in radiology to geospatial modeling for power. We will explain the opportunity for AWS Partners to increase visibility of their offerings, as well as develop joint business with AWS and we unlock new innovations for customers. We will share with partners the approach AWS is taking to address key industry use cases with Agentic AI, via partner solutions running on AWS.

title: Agentic AI Solutions for Financial Services & Insurance with AWS
abstract: Join us for an exciting deep dive into cutting-edge AI solutions for financial services and insurance Partners using AWS technologies! Discover how to harness Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands SDK to enhance customer experiences. Learn to build intelligent underwriting assistant for insurance and explore diverse use cases in Financial Services. Recommended for teams looking to strengthen their AI capabilities in financial services.

title: Agentic AI: The Next Frontier of Cloud Intelligence (sponsored by Atos)
abstract: Agentic AI represents a major evolution in artificial intelligence—where autonomous agents move beyond task execution to intelligent orchestration. On AWS, this paradigm shift is powered by services like Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, Lambda, and Step Functions, enabling AI agents to reason, plan, and act in dynamic business environments. These agents can self-adapt, collaborate, and stay in sync with real-time enterprise data. From software development to customer service, Agentic AI accelerates outcomes with minimal human intervention. We will discuss how AWS provides the foundational building blocks to scale autonomous decision-making across workflows, unlocking a new era of cloud-native intelligence This presentation is brought to you by Atos, an AWS Partner.

session.title: Agentic AI: The Next Frontier of Cloud Intelligence (sponsored by Atos)
